data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Baja California that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baja California, Mexico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: There are 3,337,500 people living in the state of Baja California. Only about 349,737 might be believers.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Baja California, Mexico.
data.prayer: Father, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Baja California, Mexico. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 349,737 believers in the state of Baja California.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Huichol people. 0.4% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Baja California, Mexico to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Baja California, Mexico.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Baja California, Mexico that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
